body.name: Garmin DriveSmart 65 & Traffic: GPS Navigator with a 6.95 inches Display, Hands-Free Calling, Included Traffic alerts and Information to enrich Road Trips (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: EASY-TO-USE: Simple on-screen menus and bright, clear maps with 3D buildings and terrain.
UP-TO-DATE MAPS: Includes detailed map updates of North America.
REAL-TIME TRAFFIC ALERTS: Garmin Traffic is ready to use right out of the box, without the need for a smartphone.
VOICE-ACTIVATED NAVIGATION: Control the device with your voice.
HANDS-FREE CALLING: Pair with a compatible smartphone for hands-free calling.
SMART NOTIFICATIONS: Receive notifications for texts, calls, and calendar events on the navigator's display.
LIVE TRAFFIC: Get live traffic updates via the Garmin Drive App.
body.description: Voice-activated and ability to pair with a compatible and GPS-enabled smartphone for hands-free calling, smart notifications and live traffic via the Garmin Drive App

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and back up camera feature works
reviews.reviewText: Recently bought the DriveSmart 65 model and coupled it with the wireless bc 40 reverse camera device. Both are working as expected with no issues for now. I will update this review in the future if things start breaking down, but the gps I bought was refurbished so I'm tentative to say lots of good things until a few more months of use. Out of the box, the device is working well and despite having to update the software with the latest maps and firmware (I think it was a 9gb update), the screen is bright, the touch screen is responsive, the UI is easy to read, and settings are easy to find and adjust. I usually drive around with google maps running in the background on my phone while this device is running for redundancy, and it's been accurate in navigation so far, especially in Houston with all the construction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great GPS, always accurate and works quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a Garmin
reviews.reviewText: The Chinese product I purchased before this one was less than half the cost of a Garmin. It did the job for local addresses, but updates were extremely hard and I had to drag and drop files to update the GPS. Why should I have to delete files and then drag/drop them to update the maps??!!So I returned it for a full refund.So I got this and not only does it do the job, updates are easy and fast with the touch of a button. I've had no issues with finding any directions and I've glad I spent more for a quality product. The only issue I've had with this refurbished product is that during my drive, at times the maps screen keep switching by itself without me touching it. It's very annoying and I have to switch it back during my driving. After doing this about 4-5 times, the issue stops.Because of this issue, I'll give it a 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: This GPS has many impressive features. Its screen size, resolution, and image quality surpass any other GPS I have used. The wireless updating feature is convenient, eliminating the need to connect to a computer. The smartphone app's functionality, allowing direct transfer of directions to the phone and receiving weather and live traffic updates on the GPS, is very efficient. A standout feature is the GPS's intuitive display of rest stops, eateries, and gas stations during long drives, which is incredibly helpful.On the downside, like many Garmin products, the voice command feature is disappointing. It only worked once in numerous attempts, and even then, it failed to recognize my command accurately. Despite this, the GPS is still quite user-friendly without voice commands.I experienced a technical issue when my unit, which was refurbished, stopped functioning a few weeks after purchase. I have since ordered a replacement. Overall, I would give it a strong rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars. Look no further - buy it now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a refurbished unit to save money which I did and when I finally got it it was in perfect condition with all the accessories and it works great the only negative is that the battery does not hold the charge very long but that's not a problem I just leave it plugged in when I'm driving so if you're looking for a refurb GPS buy one from this company and save you some money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this to replace a old TomTom
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new GPS for the car found this bought it to replace an old TomTom.The garmin works great,glad I bought it,the first use was to hospital in a town I don't know, worked great.Have some trips planed in 2024,this will be put to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished unit had male connectors on screen and charging cable
reviews.reviewText: I cannot speak for how the GPS functions, because It cannot be powered on. I purchased a refurbished unit. The GPS itself had a male plug on the back. Both of the cables came with male plugs also. They cannot be connected. Thus the GPS is useless. I returned it for a replacement. The return process says it will be a week before the new one comes. We will see if this is a mistake or a systemic problem with "iSave Renewed", the vendor.

reviews.reviewText: I like it came with attachments and was very easy to use
